lender.loan_because: In my previous work in microenterprise development with the Renaissance Entrepreneurship Center Mid-Peninsula, and during my travels in West Africa, I've seen first hand how small contributions can make a huge difference in the lives of entrepreneurial men and women. 1. Preach salvation, deliverance and healing . . . Mark 6:7-13 (Mark 3:14-15; Luke 9:1-5) 2. Forgiving sins . . . John 20:23 3. Care and feed the flock . . . John 21:15-17 4. Preach and testify . . . Acts 10:42 (Acts 1 and 2) 5. The keys of heaven . . . Matthew 16:19 6. Witnesses . . . Luke 24:48; 2 Peter 1:16-18; 1 John 1:1-4 (John 15:27; Acts 1:8, 2:32, 3:15, 4:33, 5:32, 10:39-41; 13:31) 7. lender.loan_because: I like people who want to help themselves, their families, and their communities

lender.name: Axel
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who have a definite plan.

lender.name: Armando
lender.loan_because: Little details can make big changes. Little loans can make wishes come true.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a graphic designer who thinks world could be better with things like Kiva.

lender.name: Iztok
lender.loan_because: To be honest, at this point in life I can afford to help others so I do help. Simple as that.
lender.occupational_info: I am a systems engineer in computer software/application delivery controller field. I am also foster/adoptive parent.

lender.name: Mike & Terry
lender.loan_because: Ify is building a school in Kogi State, where the need is GREAT! She has almost finished the school, and we want to get school supplies to the students.
lender.occupational_info: We help make education more complete, challenging, and entertaining by supplying schools with text books, readers, pencils, paper, crayons, markers, and teacher's aids.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help people make there dreams come true .
lender.occupational_info: i own a pawn shop i loan money on items of value .if they do not pay me back in 90 days i sell items and get my money back

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have a responsibility to make a better world - one with less suffering, better education and compassion. I can afford to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I have had five careers and I am currently retired. I am currently living in Ireland, where I play music and train a group of women seeking better physical health.

lender.name: Natacha
lender.occupational_info: I am Product Manager of JVN/JUVANAlimitada Group, a company in Angola, Mauritania, Portugal & Poland. Business: general trading, aviation, futbol, commodities and much more

lender.name: Mareike
lender.loan_because: it's a sustainable way to make a difference

lender.name: Ebrahim
lender.loan_because: I envision a world without poverty, and I believe that my religion demands me to do this.
lender.occupational_info: Setting up social businesses to empower people.

lender.name: Archie
lender.loan_because: God has called on us to serve others

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: To help another
lender.occupational_info: Selling to others

lender.name: Thea and Amrin
lender.loan_because: We find fulfillment in giving and in helping the less-fortunate. Someday we want to put up our own foundation.
lender.occupational_info: We are Internet entrepreneurs who love life!

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I sense a strong spirit in many of these people --- and if a $25 or $50 loan helps them get to the next level, then I see if I can make that happen.

lender.name: Hugo Rafael
lender.loan_because: Feels good to help who needs
lender.occupational_info: Construction Management

lender.name: Geoffrey
